title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Historic Ships
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections     Historic Ships                Historic Vessels      1886 square-rigger Balclutha 1895 schooner C. A. Thayer 1890 steam ferryboat Eureka 1891 scow schooner Alma 1907 steam tug Hercules 1914 paddlewheel tug Eppleton Hall 1890 (circa) San Francisco Bay Ark 1915 steam schooner Wapama          A modern-day cruise liner and the 1886 square-rigged Balclutha. NPS Photo          The bowsprit, figurehead and bow of Balclutha with the Golden Gate Bridge in the background. NPS Photo          Scow schooner Alma with sails set, running with the wind on San Francisco Bay, with the Golden Gate Bridge and Marin Headlands in the background. NPS Photo
